reviews.review_msg: Lectures were super boring - just read off a script. Tough grader and not very clear with what is required

Does peer review sessions so that she can avoid giving you feedback. "Refer to your classmates' peer review of your paper." YEAH BUT YOU'RE THE PROFESSOR STUDENTS ALSO DON'T KNOW WHAT TO DO. Peer review is so that she can get away with not having to read papers early. So fricken lazy. And she's vague AF and doesn't seem confident. Doesn't give As.

She is a dictator, it's her way or the highway. She reads off papers for her lectures, doesn't allow any constructive debate, and is never clear about what she is expecting of you, in class or for the papers she assigns. She doesn't even know how to type a concrete sentence when she gives feedback.
Terrible prof. Reads lectures off a paper and is very vague! Do not recommend.
